remarks: The function ` S ` is a family having pairwise commuting values. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprdcntz.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dprdcntz.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dprdcntz.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dprdcntz.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. I ) $.
dprdcntz.5 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) $.
dprdcntz.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
dprdcntz $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` X ) C_ ( Z ` ( S ` Y ) ) ) $.
